entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
